subject: Re: [junit] F****** Kama Sutra pics
msgSnippet: Good luck identifying Windows users out of 6000+ users... My suggestion:  make the entire list fully moderated for a few weeks.  The traffic is super low
messageBody:
Good luck identifying Windows users out of 6000+ users...

My suggestion: make the entire list fully moderated for a few weeks. The
traffic is super low anyway, it won't be that much work for the moderators.

After a few weeks, restore it to "moderate first-time posters only".

--
Cedric
http://testng.org


On 6/5/06, Anand Nene <anandn@...> wrote:
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
>
> [06/05/2006 11:48 PM IST] Mark Salter wrote:
> > As Joe stated, tlroche's postings are now back under moderation, so only
> > the moderators get the pain instead of everyone.
>
> And this might just be the beginning! Now expect to see similar
> mails coming up using other ids as well (owner + mod included)!
> Basically not letting [junit] have any unmoderated members.
>
> Before this goes out of hand, I suggest the following:
>
> - - Members using Windows, its you who can save the moderators from
> this PITA... Scan for this worm now!
>
> - - Meanwhile Mark (and moderators), you guys could zero in on those
> members using Windows and are active (since first such strike)
> and probably moderate them only. Other OS (Linux/Unix/Mac) users
> may be left unmoderated (Would save you guys some time till the
> issue is not sorted out). I see some moderators are windows
> users, so please moderate yourself as well.
>
> - - Joe you should consider sending a mail to Y! for this vulnerability
> with complete headers (If not sent already?)
>
> Anand
>
> - --
> Raikkonen heads down the straight in the pouring rain while birds
> are standing on the bend that he's approaching
